name: [GAME] Zen garden
description:
You can delete an object

And also you can change the interface if you want - marble, wood, space.

If you get bored with music, just choose the one you want (dreamy is my favorite). Just click on the song and move the cursor somewhere to the side to play the song.

Also, you can download below zip archives with pictures and music from the project, and the project itself (Construct 2, open the file with a version no less than r 279)

There is a development video for this game (turn on subtitles)

Thanks for playing!

I can be contacted here:

https://t.me/GameSunlight
https://vk.com/gamesunlight
